00033 
00034 // Includes
00035 #include <stdlib.h>
00036 #include "mac.h"
00037 #include "mac_data.h"
00038 #include "mac_scan.h"
00039 #include "mac_associate.h"
00040 #include "radio.h"
00041 #include "stdio.h"
00042 #include "system.h"
00043 #include "arm_timer_event.h"
00044 
00045 // Globals
00046 
00047 #define MAX_TIMER_EVENTS 30
00048 struct {
00049     volatile u8 head;
00050     volatile u8 tail;
00051     timer_event_object_t timer_event_object[MAX_TIMER_EVENTS];
00052 } /*__attribute__((packed))*/ timer_event_queue;
00053 
00054 // Implementation
00055 
00061 u8 timer_event_pending(void)
00062 {
00063     return (timer_event_queue.head != timer_event_queue.tail);
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00074 u8 timer_put_event(timer_event_object_t *object)
00075 {
00076     u8 newhead;
00077 
00078     if ((timer_event_queue.head + 1) % MAX_TIMER_EVENTS == timer_event_queue.tail)
00079     {
00080         fnDebugMsg("The timer queue is full, bailing out!");
00081         // Queue full, get outta here
00082         return 0;
00083     }
00084 
00085     newhead = timer_event_queue.head;
00086 
00087     // Store in queue
00088     timer_event_queue.timer_event_object[newhead] = *object;
00089 
00090     // Calculate new head index
00091     newhead++;
00092     if (newhead >= MAX_TIMER_EVENTS)
00093         newhead = 0;
00094     timer_event_queue.head = newhead;
00095 
00096     return 1;
00097 }
00098 
00105 timer_event_object_t *timer_get_event(void)
00106 {
00107     timer_event_object_t *object = NULL;
00108     volatile u8 newtail;
00109 
00110     newtail = timer_event_queue.tail;
00111 
00112     object = &(timer_event_queue.timer_event_object[newtail]);
00113 
00114     // Calculate new tail
00115     newtail++;
00116     if (newtail >= MAX_TIMER_EVENTS)
00117         newtail = 0;
00118 
00119     timer_event_queue.tail = newtail;
00120 
00121     return(object);
00122 }
00123 
00128 void timerTask(void)
00129 {
00130     timer_event_object_t *event;
00131 
00132     while(timer_event_pending())
00133     {
00134         event = timer_get_event();
00135             // Timer has expired, just callback the stored function pointer
00136             ((void (*)(void))event->data)();  // cast data to function pointer
00137     }
00138 }
